type.description: Package type, either 'library' for common packages, 'composer-installer' for custom installers, or a custom type defined by whatever project this package applies to.

target-dir.description: Forces the package to be installed into the given subdirectory path. This is used for autoloading PSR-0 packages that do not contain their full path. Use forward slashes for cross-platform compatibility.

items.description: A tag/keyword that this package relates to.

version.description: Package version, see http://packagist.org/about for more info on valid schemes.

time.description: Package release date, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

license.description: License name. Or an array of license names.

authors.description: List of authors that contributed to the package. This is typically the main maintainers, not the full list.

require.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that are required to run this package.

replace.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that can be replaced by this package.

conflict.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that conflict with this package.

provide.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that this package provides in addition to this package's name.

recommend.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that this package recommends to be installed (typically this will be installed as well).

suggest.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that this package suggests work well with it (typically this will only be suggested to the user).

vendor-dir.description: The location where all packages are installed, defaults to "vendor".

bin-dir.description: The location where all binaries are linked, defaults to "vendor/bin".

extra.description: Arbitrary extra data that can be used by custom installers, for example, package of type composer-installer must have a 'class' key defining the installer class name.

autoload.description: Description of how the package can be autoloaded.

psr-0.description: This is a hash of namespaces (keys) and the directories they can be found into (values) by the autoloader.

repositories.description: A set of additional repositories where packages can be found.

bin.description: A set of files that should be treated as binaries and symlinked into bin-dir (from config).

scripts.description: Scripts listeners that will be executed before/after some events.

pre-install-cmd.description: Occurs before the install command is executed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

post-install-cmd.description: Occurs after the install command is executed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

pre-update-cmd.description: Occurs before the update command is executed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

post-update-cmd.description: Occurs after the update command is executed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

pre-package-install.description: Occurs before a package is installed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

post-package-install.description: Occurs after a package is installed, contains one or more Class::method callables.

pre-package-update.description: Occurs before a package is updated, contains one or more Class::method callables.

post-package-update.description: Occurs after a package is updated, contains one or more Class::method callables.

pre-package-uninstall.description: Occurs before a package has been uninstalled, contains one or more Class::method callables.

post-package-uninstall.description: Occurs after a package has been uninstalled, contains one or more Class::method callables.
